attributes.action: Reconsider the rule of no parent to grassroots kids football safeguard are kids
attributes.additional_details: Covid has already challenged are kids mental health it should be 1 parent per child we need to safe guard are children through this pandemic but in a safe way 2 metre apart sanitiser masks if can be worn, it’s not right parents are asked to leave there child with a manager there already suffering in this pandemic there there to enjoy an learn with praise from parents , please don’t make are children suffer more than they already are 1 parent per child some kids suffer asd adhd separation anxiety
attributes.background: Change the rule of having no parent at are children’s football grassroots, these kids are young a vulnerable some have mental health issues adhd asd autism separation issues but not only this it is not acceptable to leave are children with there managers to feel insecure at such a young age
